summary: Overweight loner Rino spends his days in seclusion, until his dad rents a room to an overtly sexual girl who challenges Rino to break down his walls.
cast: Nils Jørgen Kaalstad|Josefin Ljungman|Kyrre Hellum|Jenny Skavlan|Per Kjerstad|Arnt Egil Andreassen|Rudi Simmons|Jon Anders Løvøen|Petter Kaalstad|Lisa Loven Kongsli|Mattis Herman Nyquist|Ann Eleonora Jørgensen|Julia Markiewicz|Colleen Christiansen|Maren Vik|Anna Julia Granberg|Nikoo Hamzarvi|Maren Bervell|Marie Gisselbæk|Anders Baasmo Christiansen|Andrea Eckerbom|Silje Marie Korsnes|Mari Sletten|Edie Grønningsæter Pallum|Joachim Levin|Jesper Lind|Mats Eldøen|Fanny Vaager|Ida Holma Nielsen|Lars Gudmestad|Arild Fröhlich|Beathe Grøgård|Marthine Tangen|Anne Næss Eidsaune|Jeanette Gulbrandsen|Hanne Marie Bratteng|Unni Dyrvik|Tine Erika Aspaas|Kristin Brathagen|Lisbeth Sandnes Espeland|Birgitte Lund|Anne Marit Tynes|Lasse Gretland|Caroline Andersen|Lena Ask|Jon Einar Sivertsen|Espen Aas|Devon Taylor|Line Sofie Adams|Lisbeth Ottosen|Cecilie Enersen|Charlotte Grundt|Fransisca Hidle
title: Fatso
